trans-unit.source: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény jelenik meg, ha egy időszak vége adatait tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to window-closed events, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, specifying <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a WindowClosedEventArgs parameter.
trans-unit.target: Események ablak bezárását előfizetni, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>megadását, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent>a a `eventId` paraméter, és biztosítja az [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] eseménykezelő, amely egy WindowClosedEventArgs paramétert fogad.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Ha az alkalmazás egy ablak bezárását esemény kap a `sender` az eseménykezelő paraméter nem használható információt szeretne kapni az ablak, amely be van zárva, mert a megfelelő [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem már nem érvényes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.
Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Lekéri a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] futásidejű [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] az eseményhez kapcsolódó.

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Ha az alkalmazás egy ablak bezárását esemény kap a `sender` az eseménykezelő paraméter nem használható információt szeretne kapni az ablak, amely be van zárva, mert a megfelelő [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elem már nem érvényes.

trans-unit.source: Use GetRuntimeId to match the window with a known identifier.
trans-unit.target: Az ablak ismert azonosítóval egyező GetRuntimeId használja.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the window on which the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] futásidejű [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] az ablak, amelyen az esemény időpontja.
